headline: ComEd Launches EV Ambassador Program to Expand EV Adoption in Northern Illinois
summary: CHICAGO, May 27, 2025--To expand efforts to support customers considering making the switch to electric vehicles (EVs), ComEd today announced the launch of its new EV Ambassador Program, a community-driven initiative designed to expand education and awareness around EV adoption and benefits in northern Illinois. The program will launch with the introduction of three local partner organizations: Equiticity, Bronzeville Community Development Partnership and A Step Beyond NFP. EV Ambassadors throug
